Politicians, Indigenous leaders visit beleaguered Manitoba First Nation after damaging power outage
Description
4 hours ago
Politicians and Indigenous leaders are assessing the damage on Pimicikamak Cree Nation, Man., where a power outage in December has forced thousands of people from their homes. Melissa Ridgen explains why it could take a while for residents to return home, and what's being called for to assist recovery efforts.
